attributes.action: Give nurses NHS nurses and all key workers a decent pay increase.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to reconsider their pay freeze and pitiful NHS 1% offer which in real terms is 0.9% equating to an average £3.50 per week increase. This must be revised to reflect the dedication NHS and front line  key workers bring to their role, to show our appreciation as a nation and to help retain and attract more people to take up a career in the NHS and Key Public Services. The 1% increase and freeze insults  all those that have worked tirelessly over the past year.
attributes.background: Given the unprecedented pressure our NHS and key front line services have been under the past year due to the Covid -19 pandemic. All NHS and key workers have and continue to sacrificed so much, putting their own lives in danger on a daily basis. Their pay freeze and 1% offer must be reconsidered.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
